answers.text:
Katie – hope these links are helpful

author: Katie Wilken
text: The City of Goodyear would like to know if anyone has established a "conflict resolution" process or procedures for dealing with issues that arise during the development review process.  This would be an administrative process before an issue would be taken to a formal Board of Appeals/Board of Adjustment.
title: Conflict resolution in the development review process
